evaluations.description: Comprehensive evaluation questions for SoloLedger MCP Server. These questions test the AI's ability to use multiple tools, navigate hierarchical data, perform calculations, and answer realistic business intelligence queries.

qa_pair.question: What is the name of the income category that has been used most frequently (by transaction count) in the last 12 months, excluding categories that are marked as inactive?
qa_pair.answer: Replace with actual category name after testing
qa_pair.complexity: Medium - Requires filtering, sorting, and excluding inactive categories

qa_pair.question: Find the vendor with the highest total expense amount in Q4 2024 (October 1 to December 31, 2024). What is the exact total amount spent with this vendor during this period, rounded to 2 decimal places?
qa_pair.answer: Replace with actual amount after testing
qa_pair.complexity: High - Requires date filtering, vendor totals, and amount aggregation

qa_pair.question: What is the base currency code (3 letters) configured for the organization?
qa_pair.answer: Replace with actual currency code after testing

qa_pair.question: How many expense categories are currently marked as "includeInPnL: true" AND "active: true"? Provide only the count as a number.
qa_pair.answer: Replace with actual count after testing
qa_pair.complexity: Medium - Requires filtering by multiple boolean fields

qa_pair.question: Find all POSTED transactions that have documents linked to them. What is the transaction ID of the most recent POSTED transaction (by date) that has at least one document attached? If multiple transactions share the same most recent date, provide the transaction ID that comes first alphabetically.
qa_pair.answer: Replace with actual transaction ID after testing
qa_pair.complexity: High - Requires cross-referencing transactions and documents, date sorting

qa_pair.question: What is the fiscal year start month number (1-12) configured in the financial settings? For example, 1 means January, 7 means July, etc.
qa_pair.answer: Replace with actual month number after testing

qa_pair.question: Find the category that is a child category (has a parentId) with the type "EXPENSE". What is the name of its parent category? If there are multiple child expense categories, provide the parent name of the one whose child name comes first alphabetically.
qa_pair.answer: Replace with actual parent category name after testing
qa_pair.complexity: Medium - Requires hierarchical navigation and sorting

qa_pair.question: What is the total number of DRAFT transactions (both INCOME and EXPENSE) that currently exist in the system (not in trash)? Provide only the count as a number.
qa_pair.answer: Replace with actual count after testing
qa_pair.complexity: Medium - Requires status filtering and counting

qa_pair.question: Find the account that is marked as the default account (isDefault: true). What is the exact balance (income minus expenses) for this account over the last 30 days, rounded to 2 decimal places?
qa_pair.answer: Replace with actual balance after testing
qa_pair.complexity: High - Requires finding default account then calculating balance

qa_pair.question: How many documents in the system have the type "RECEIPT" and are currently linked to at least one transaction (not in trash)? Provide only the count as a number.
qa_pair.answer: Replace with actual count after testing
qa_pair.complexity: Medium - Requires type and linked status filtering

evaluations.instructions:
To use these evaluations:
1. Set up a test organization with sample data 2. For each question: a. Manually solve using the MCP tools b. Record the correct answer c. Replace the placeholder answer in this file 3. Run the evaluation script to test AI performance 4. Answers should be stable (not change over time) 5. All questions use READ-ONLY operations
Note: Before running automated evaluations, you must populate the actual answers by manually solving each question with real data in your test organization.
